struct DAOInterface.Proposal storage ref[] storage ref

approve(address,uint256).notice: `msg.sender` approves `_spender` to spend `_amount` tokens on its behalf

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: Send `_amount` tokens to `_to` from `_from` on the condition it is approved by `_from`

params._owner: The address of the account owning tokens
params._spender: The address of the account able to transfer the tokens

allowance(address,address).return: Amount of remaining tokens of _owner that _spender is allowed to spend

params._amount: The amount of tokens to be approved for transfer
params._spender: The address of the account able to transfer the tokens

approve(address,uint256).return: Whether the approval was successful or not

params._owner: The address from which the balance will be retrieved

params._amount: The amount of tokens to be transferred

transfer(address,uint256).return: Whether the transfer was successful or not

params._amount: The amount of tokens to be transferred
params._from: The address of the origin of the transfer

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).return: Whether the transfer was successful or not

changeAllowedRecipients(address,bool).notice: Add a new possible recipient `_recipient` to the whitelist so that the DAO can send transactions to them (using proposals)

changeProposalDeposit(uint256).notice: Change the minimum deposit required to submit a proposal

checkProposalCode(uint256,address,uint25.notice: Check that the proposal with the ID `_proposalID` matches the transaction which sends `_amount` with data `_transactionData` to `_recipient`

executeProposal(uint256,bytes).notice: Checks whether proposal `_proposalID` with transaction data `_transactionData` has been voted for or rejected, and executes the transaction in the case it has been voted for.

getMyReward().notice: Get my portion of the reward that was sent to `rewardAccount`

halveMinQuorum().notice: Doubles the 'minQuorumDivisor' in the case quorum has not been achieved in 52 weeks

newProposal(address,uint256,string,bytes.notice: `msg.sender` creates a proposal to send `_amount` Wei to `_recipient` with the transaction data `_transactionData`. If `_newCurator` is true, then this is a proposal that splits the DAO and sets `_recipient` as the new DAO's Curator.

retrieveDAOReward(bool).notice: Move rewards from the DAORewards managed account

splitDAO(uint256,address).notice: ATTENTION! I confirm to move my remaining ether to a new DAO with `_newCurator` as the new Curator, as has been proposed in proposal `_proposalID`. This will burn my tokens. This can not be undone and will split the DAO into two DAO's, with two different underlying tokens.

transferFromWithoutReward(address,addres.notice: Send `_amount` tokens to `_to` from `_from` on the condition it is approved by `_from`. Prior to this getMyReward() is called.

transferWithoutReward(address,uint256).notice: Send `_amount` tokens to `_to` from `msg.sender`. Prior to this getMyReward() is called.

unblockMe().notice: If the caller is blocked by a proposal whose voting deadline has exprired then unblock him.

changeAllowedRecipients(address,bool).details: Can only be called by the current Curator

changeProposalDeposit(uint256).details: Can only be called by this DAO (through proposals with the recipient being this DAO itself)

params._amount: The amount of wei to be sent in the proposed transaction
params._recipient: The recipient of the proposed transaction
params._transactionData: The data of the proposed transaction

checkProposalCode(uint256,address,uint25.return: Whether the proposal ID matches the transaction data or not

params._transactionData: The data of the proposed transaction

executeProposal(uint256,bytes).return: Whether the proposed transaction has been executed or not

params._proposalID: Id of the new curator proposal

halveMinQuorum().return: Whether the change was successful or not

newContract(address).details: can only be called by the DAO itself through a proposal updates the contract of the DAO by sending all ether and rewardTokens to the new DAO. The new DAO needs to be approved by the Curator

params._newContract: the address of the new contract

params._amount: Amount of wei to be sent with the proposed transaction
params._debatingPeriod: Time used for debating a proposal, at least 2 weeks for a regular proposal, 10 days for new Curator proposal
params._newCurator: Bool defining whether this proposal is about a new Curator or not
params._recipient: Address of the recipient of the proposed transaction

newProposal(address,uint256,string,bytes.return: The proposal ID. Needed for voting on the proposal

numberOfProposals().return: total number of proposals ever created

receiveEther().details: This function is used to send ether back to the DAO, it can also be used to receive payments that should not be counted as rewards (donations, grants, etc.)
receiveEther().return: Whether the DAO received the ether successfully

params._toMembers: If true rewards are moved to the actual reward account                   for the DAO. If not then it's moved to the DAO itself

splitDAO(uint256,address).details: This function, when called for the first time for this proposal, will create a new DAO and send the sender's portion of the remaining ether and Reward Tokens to the new DAO. It will also burn the DAO Tokens of the sender.

params._newCurator: The new Curator of the new DAO

params._amount: The amount of tokens to be transfered

transferFromWithoutReward(address,addres.return: Whether the transfer was successful or not

params._amount: The amount of tokens to be transfered

transferWithoutReward(address,uint256).return: Whether the transfer was successful or not

unblockMe().return: Whether the account is blocked (not allowed to transfer tokens) or not.

params._amount: The amount of wei to send to `_recipient`
params._recipient: The address to receive `_amount` of wei

createTokenProxy(address).notice: Create Token with `_tokenHolder` as the initial owner of the Token

refund().notice: Refund `msg.sender` in the case the Token Creation did not reach its minimum fueling goal

params._tokenHolder: The address of the Tokens's recipient

createTokenProxy(address).return: Whether the token creation was successful

divisor().return: The divisor used to calculate the token creation rate during the creation phase
